uvi.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v4.19.209
uvi.description:
sctp: break out if skb_header_pointer returns NULL in sctp_rcv_ootb

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.209 by commit 8c630a7b4f9dec63f08bd881ab77984a724a5124, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 3acb50c18d8d6650f10919464ade4dcdaf41d62f. For more details please see the references link.
